abstract: Rick Santorum on Thursday criticized the president for making a recess appointment to the consumer protection bureau and also took a swipe at Mitt Romney, his main rival in New Hampshire.
lead_paragraph: MANCHESTER, N.H. -- Rick Santorum on Thursday assailed President Obama for the recess appointments he made a day earlier, accusing the president of thinking he is "above the law" and urging the Senate to "go to the ramparts on this one."

headline.main: Santorum Criticizes Obama for Recess Appointments
